scripts.ssr:archive: npm run ssr:build && cp -R statics/ public/ && cp public/index.html public/200.html && sui-ssr archive -C > /tmp/server-src-$DATE.zip
scripts.ssr:deploy: export DATE=`date "+%Y%m%d-%s"` && export CDN=https://$SUBDOMAIN.surge.sh/ && npm run ssr:archive && unzip -o /tmp/server-src-$DATE.zip -d /tmp/server-src-$DATE || true && npm run spa:deploy && sui-deploy $SUBDOMAIN /tmp/server-src-$DATE --now
scripts.ssr:deploy:development: export NODE_ENV=development && export SUBDOMAIN=spa-mock-$NODE_ENV && npm run ssr:deploy
scripts.ssr:deploy:pr: export NODE_ENV=development && export SUBDOMAIN=spa-mock-$NODE_ENV-PR-$TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST && npm run ssr:deploy
scripts.ssr:deploy:production: export NODE_ENV=production && export SUBDOMAIN=spa-mock-$NODE_ENV && npm run ssr:deploy
